resource.chars:
little more stretched than in others. The 
drawings have been still further enlarged 
so that the figures as I have represented 
them are from two-and-a-half to three 
times the natural size. They are much 
more instructive when enlarged as by 
so doing parts wh: are naturally small 
& wh: would appear insignificant if thus
represented are brought into greater prominence. 
I will not vouch for the absolute correctness 
of the relative size of one figure to another.
They are, however, in this respect as nearly 
as possible accurate. The accuracy of the relative size of the 
parts of each individual drawing I will 
vouch for as they have been represented 
with the greatest care.
